Utilities may over-cross or under-cross sewer at minimum 1m vertical clearance but shall not be laid parallel to and over the sewer. Utilities laid parallel to the sewer shall keep a minimum 1m horizontal clearance from the sewer edge. Where the utility authorities require clearance of more than 1m for on sewers near their utilities after they are put into use, their proposed utilities shall keep the same clearance to the existing sewer in any direction when the utilities are laid.
